resources.string: Point your camera towards a surface, move it until you\'ll see a grid and tap on it to place a lake.
On the bottom left you can go to your personal collection of fishes!\nCheck all the fishes you\'ve got!
On the bottom right you\'ll find the lures, each with a unique effect!
Time to catch something!\nUse one of these actions to cast the rod!
Is that a fish?!\nQuick, use one of these actions to catch it!
You\'ve caught something!\nYou can find its name and ID on the card top, or learn more details!
Good job, you have completed the tutorial! Have fun!
A common lure used for a common fish
Increase the chance to get a rare fish
Increase the chance to get an abyssal type fish
Increase the chance to get a legendary fish
